title: Verizon is Updating Its Newest Galaxy Devices With Samsung Pay Support Today, Stagefright Patches Too
text:

If you are a Verizon customer who owns a Samsung Galaxy S6, Galaxy S6 Edge, Galaxy S6 Edge+, or Galaxy Note 5, be sure to check for a softwa...
